name: Damsel
starring: Millie Bobby Brown, Ray Winstone, and Robin Wright
desc: A young woman's marriage to a charming prince turns into a fierce fight for survival when she's offered up as a sacrifice to a fire-breathing dragon

name: Spider_Man: No Way Home
starring: Tom Holland, Zendaya, and Benedict Cumberbatch
desc: When his loved ones are put at risk, Peter Parker asks Doctor Strange to restore his secret — and accidentally sets off a disaster of epic proportions.

name: Ulajh
starring: Janhvi Kapoor, Gulshan Devaiah, and Roshan Mathew
desc: A young diplomat from a powerful family is elevated to a prestigious position in London. But a reckless affair gets her entangled in a global conspiracy.

name: Nowhere
starring: Anna Castillo, Tamar Novas, and Tony Corvillo
desc: Pregnant, alone and drifting in the sea, a woman trapped in a shipping container tries to survive after fleeing a devastated totalitarian country.

name: Ready or Not
starring: Samara Weaving, Adam Brody, and Mark O'Brien
desc: A bride's romantic wedding night takes a terrifying turn when her wealthy and eccentric in-laws force her to play a gruesome game of hide-and-seek.

name: Lift
starring: Kevin Hart, Gugu Mbatha-Raw, and Vincent D'Onofrio
desc: A professional thief and his expert crew attempt the ultimate heist: stealing $500 million in gold from a vault on a plane — 40,000 feet in the air.

name: Maharaja
starring: Vijay Sethupathi, Anurag Kashyap, and Mamtha Mohandas
desc: When his prized possession gets stolen, a barber seeks help from the police, who jeer at his request — until they learn what they're really looking for

name: Assassins
starring: Sylvester Stallone, Antonio Banderas, and Julianne Moore
desc: An elite contract killer planning to call it quits crosses paths with a brash hit man aiming to poach his final assignment by any means necessary

name: Badland hunters
starring: Don Lee, Lee Hee-jun, and Lee Jun-young
desc: After a deadly earthquake turns Seoul into a lawless badland, a fearless huntsman springs into action to rescue a teenager abducted by a mad doctor.

name: Salaar
starring: Prabhas, Prithviraj Sukumaran, and Shruthi Haasan
desc: The fate of a violently contested kingdom hangs on the fraught bond between two friends-turned-foes in this saga of power, bloodshed and betrayal

name: Kingsman:The secret Service
starring: Colin Firth, Samuel L. Jackson, and Mark Strong
desc: A top secret British spy agency recruits a juvenile delinquent, and a stylish mentor trains him in the skills of tradecraft.

name: Iraivan
starring: Jayam Ravi, Nayanthara, and Vinoth Kishan
desc: A police officer with a tendency to take justice into his own hands embarks on an intense hunt for a brutal serial killer.

name: Extraction 2
starring: Chris Hemsworth, Golshifteh Farahani, and Tornike Gogrichiani
desc: Back from the brink of death, highly skilled commando Tyler Rake takes on another dangerous mission: saving the imprisoned family of a ruthless gangster

name: Ninjaa Assassin
starring: Jung Ji-hoon, Naomie Harris, and Ben Miles
desc: A former assassin must protect himself and a Europol agent from a ruthless band of assassins who wish to exist in secrecy

name: The platform 2
starring: Milena Smit, Hovik Keuchkerian, and Natalia Tena
desc: After a mysterious leader imposes his law in a brutal system of vertical cells, a new arrival battles against a dubious food distribution method.
